attributes.action: Stop London Road Primary School Demolish by Celtic FC
attributes.additional_details:
London Road Primary School is being targeted by Celtic FC to be demolished to give them EVEN more space in the east end of Glasgow, whereby they can build a theatre, another Superstore and a cafe.

London Road Primary School deserves better than this.  They are voting on this issue on 31 August and I would be grateful if you could sign this e-petition to stop this process.
